title: 3BR fully furnished apartment at Havelock Town for sale
details:
3 bedroom fully furnished elegant apartment on the 3rd floor in Havelock Town. The well maintained condominium facilities include two lifts, gym, roof-top entertainment area, with air-conditioned reception area, reserved car park, auto-start standby Generator & 24hr security. Walking distance to a wide variety of restaurants including the Pizza Hut, Dominos & Kushmi & the 24 Hr Laughs Supermarket.

32" LCD TV with Digital Cable TV and ADSL WI FI broadband, Piped Cooking Gas & Water. Hot water in bathrooms and kitchen. Fully equipped kitchen with fridge, washing machine, cooker hob, microwave etc.

One bedroom is equipped with a 75"x60" Queen Size bed with an 8" spring mattress. Second and third bedrooms are equipped with two single beds each with 8" spring mattresses. En-suite master bathroom.

No brokers
